original_title: Priority to importing buses, motorcycles, industrial vehicles when relaxing import restrictions
original_body_lines: Finance State Minister Ranjith Siyambalapitiya said yesterday in parliament that priority will be given to motorcycles, public transport vehicles and industrial vehicles when relaxing import restrictions in future.
While addressing Parliament yesterday, he said that the tax revenue lost to the government due to the suspension of vehicle imports between 2020 and 2023 is Rs. 620 billion.
